## hpr0649 :: Doing your own auto repairs

 

Quvmoh and Phantom Hawk discuss doing your own auto repairs, getting help
on forums and the infamous $50 paint job


https://www.tirerack.com/index_w.jsp
https://www.rickwrench.com/index79master.htm?https://www.rickwrench.com/50dollarpaint.html
